plot: A consideration of contemporary Slovenian vagrancy by following and giving voice to three vagrants from Ljubljana: Toncek, Dare and Igor.
title: King of the Road
plot_es: A consideration of contemporary Slovenian vagrancy by following and giving voice to three vagrants from Ljubljana: Toncek, Dare and Igor.
plot_en: A consideration of contemporary Slovenian vagrancy by following and giving voice to three vagrants from Ljubljana: Toncek, Dare and Igor.
